definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: In school teach him it is far more honourable to fail than to cheat.
sentences.chinese: 教他求學時不及格比作弊來得剛正。

sentences.english: Convinced of his own righteousness, he was the perfect impersonation of a man of rectitude .
sentences.chinese: 他確信自己很正直，可以完美地扮演剛正不阿的人。

sentences.english: Convinced of his own righteousness, he was the perfect impersonation of a man of rectitude.
sentences.chinese: 他確信自己很正直，可以完美地扮演剛正不阿的人。

sentences.english: He is made of Luoyang, and his upright, without fear of power, strict law enforcement.
sentences.chinese: 他是洛陽令，爲人剛正，不畏權勢，執法嚴明。

sentences.english: This is yet another slur on the integrity of the Metropolitan Police.
sentences.chinese: 這是對倫敦市警察局剛正廉明作風的又一次誹謗。

sentences.english: Your dad and I were just dealing with a little trouble.
sentences.chinese: 你父親剛正和我應付件麻煩事兒。
